_sText: Teh LightninG presents Surf_Dionysus Typ: Linear Surftime: 45-55 Seconds Some notes to the map: Yea I know that the map is dark but thats how it should be. Blazin said I should make a hard map with an new design. Here it is. -------------------------------------- -------------------------------------- Special Thanks to: Sangre: He gives me a moralboost to finish this map. Timae: He makes me laugh with amazing jokes :D Copy-Mark: He showed me how to use Premiere Pro. .Eric: For is great metal textures. Visit: Sparkles Productions -------------------------------------- Edit: So many guys asked me "Surfed you with timescale?" So here is the solution what i did: 1. Go to my onlineserver & switched on SourceTV Recording. (host_timescale 1,0) 2. Downloaded the .dem of the server opened it in css. 3. Typed sv_cheats 1 + cl_drawhud 0 + host_timescale 0,1 in the console, started fraps, resumed the demo and started recording with fraps. 4. I put the .avi-Files of Fraps in AfterEffects and take the speed x1000. Original surf now. 5. Edited the video. The answer is: NO! I donÂ´t surfed with timescale. -------------------------------------- [E]njoy!
